data_table.description: Personal History Form, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: PHXB1A
variable.description: [Medical care]. Please tell me if you usually go to one or more of the following sources of medical care when you want help with a health problem. By a 'health problem' I mean an illness, a medical question or concern, or a need for a test or treatment. Private physician. Q1a [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB1B
variable.description: [Medical care]. Please tell me if you usually go to one or more of the following sources of medical care when you want help with a health problem. By a 'health problem' I mean an illness, a medical question or concern, or a need for a test or treatment. HMO. Q1b [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB1C
variable.description: [Medical care]. Please tell me if you usually go to one or more of the following sources of medical care when you want help with a health problem. By a 'health problem' I mean an illness, a medical question or concern, or a need for a test or treatment. Walk-in clinic. Q1c [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB1D
variable.description: [Medical care]. Please tell me if you usually go to one or more of the following sources of medical care when you want help with a health problem. By a 'health problem' I mean an illness, a medical question or concern, or a need for a test or treatment. Regular clinic. Q1d [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB1E
variable.description: [Medical care]. Please tell me if you usually go to one or more of the following sources of medical care when you want help with a health problem. By a 'health problem' I mean an illness, a medical question or concern, or a need for a test or treatment. Hospital emergency room. Q1e [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB1F
variable.description: [Medical care]. Please tell me if you usually go to one or more of the following sources of medical care when you want help with a health problem. By a 'health problem' I mean an illness, a medical question or concern, or a need for a test or treatment. Other. Q1f [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB2A
variable.description: [Medical care]. To help pay for your medical care, do you NOW have: health insurance or a health plan, such as Blue Cross/Blue Shield or an HMO. Q2a [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB2B
variable.description: [Medical care]. To help pay for your medical care, do you NOW have: Medicare. Q2b [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB2C
variable.description: [Medical care]. To help pay for your medical care, do you NOW have: Medicaid. Q2c [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB2D
variable.description: [Medical care]. To help pay for your medical care, do you NOW have: other. Q2d [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB3
variable.description: [Medical care]. Have you seen a doctor, a physician's assistant or a nurse practitioner for any reason in the last 12 months? Q3 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB4
variable.description: [Medical care]. Have you ever been treated by a doctor for high blood pressure? Q4 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB5
variable.description: [Medical care]. Have you ever been treated by a doctor for high blood cholesterol? Q5 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6A
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Heart attack. Q6a [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6B
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Heart failure or congestive heart failure. Q6b [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6C
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Diabetes (sugar in the blood). Q6c [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6D
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Chronic lung disease, such as bronchitis, or emphysema. Q6d [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6E
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Asthma. Q6e [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6F
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Cancer. Q6f [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6G
variable.description: [Medical care]. Can you tell me in what part of the body the cancer was located? Q6g [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6I
variable.description: [Medical care]. Have you had another cancer? Q6i [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6J
variable.description: [Medical care]. Can you tell me in what part of the body the cancer was located? Q6j [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB7
variable.description: [Smoking]. Have you ever smoked cigarettes? Q7 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB8
variable.description: [Smoking]. Do you now smoke cigarettes? Q8 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB9
variable.description: [Smoking]. When did you smoke your last cigarette? Q9 [Personal History form, exam 4]
variable.value: At least 2 months ago, but less than 12 months ago
At least 12 months ago, but less than 24 months ago
At least 24 months ago, but less than 36 months ago

variable.name: PHXB12A
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you have ever used the following? Pipe/cigars/cigarillos. Q12a [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB12B
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you have ever used the following? Chewing tobacco. Q12b [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB12C
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you have ever used the following? Snuff. Q12c [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB12D
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you have ever used the following? Nicotine gum that was prescribed by a doctor. Q12d [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB12E
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you have ever used the following? Nicotine patch that was prescribed by a doctor. Q12e [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB14
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Have you ever consumed alcoholic beverages? Q14 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB15
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Do you presently drink alcoholic beverages? Q15 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB16
variable.description: [Alcohol]. When did you have your last alcoholic beverage? Q16 [Personal History form, exam 4]
variable.value: At least 2 months ago, but less than 12 months ago
At least 12 months ago, but less than 24 months ago
At least 24 months ago, but less than 36 months ago

variable.name: PHXB22
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Method of data collection. Q22 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB23
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Code number of person completing this form. Q23 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB10
variable.description: [Smoking]. Prior to quitting, how many cigarettes did you usually smoke per day? Q10 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB11
variable.description: [Smoking]. How many cigarettes do you usually smoke per day now? Q11 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB13
variable.description: [Smoking]. During the past year, about how many hours per week, on average, were you in close contact with people when they were smoking? For example, in your home, in a car, at work or other close quarters. Q13 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB17A
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many glasses of wine do you usually have per week? Q17a [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB17B
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many days in a week do you usually drink wine? Q17b [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB18A
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many glasses, bottles, or cans of beer do you usually have per week? Q18a [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB19A
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many drinks of hard liquor do you usually have per week? Q19a [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB19B
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many days in a week do you usually drink hard liquor? Q19b [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB20
variable.description: [Alcohol]. During the past 24 hours, how many drinks have you had? Q20 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXBFLAG
variable.description: 1= PHXB form is present [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXBCY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB18B
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many days in a week do you usually drink beer? Q18b [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6HMONTHS
variable.description: Months of date of cancer diagnosis since exam 1 [Personal History form, exam 4]

variable.name: PHXB6KMONTHS
variable.description: Months of date of 2nd cancer diagnosis since exam 1 [Personal History form, exam 4]
